turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, Ben, How are you? I was wondering if you could place an order for me at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, no problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, what is the nearest Starbucks location in my Town?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is one by you on University Drive. The address is 2800 University Drive, Coral Springs, 33065

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, and what is the telephone number?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, Can you list some of the types of drinks offered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, they have lattes, tea, chai style lattes, citrus defenders, lemonades, infusions, cold foam brews, regular coffee, iced coffee, and espressos.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, and what kind of milk do they offer?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They offer almond, non-fat, coconut, whole milk, 2% and Soy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kind of flavored syrups do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Starbucks offers: vanilla (available sugar-free) caramel (available sugar-free) cinnamon dolce (available sugar-free) hazelnut (available sugar-free) toffee nut. peppermint (available sugar-free seasonally), classic, and hazelnut. They have sugar free and lower fat options.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How knowledgeable would the baristas be about nutrition facts?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Very knowledgeable, every employee is trained at a school to learn all facets of the store, including nutrition.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What sizes are offered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: At Starbucks, the sizes for drinks are short, tall, grande, venti, and treinta; grande being the medium size. There are 16 oz in a grande size drink at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, I would like 1 tall Pike place roast coffee, 1 vanilla sweet cream cold brew, 1 Nitro cold brew with whipped cream, 1 cinnamon shortbread frappuccino, and 2 espressos with vanilla. All vent sized, except the Pike place roast, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, do they have blueberry muffins?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes they have an assortment of baked goods.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, I would also like to add 4 blueberry muffins. That completes the order. Can you have that ready for me as soon as possible?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, the order has been placed so if you want to pick it up shortly, it will be available at the University location, by your residence. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device so be sure to check for it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you for all of your help with the order. Cheers and I'll talk to you soon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, talk to you soon. Goodbye.

items.name: 16 oz in a grande size drink
